SafeTrip is designed for a fast fare payment process without using real cash money. As soon as you paid the fare, It will connect you to the real time location of the jeepney while also giving you points as a reward to redeem free rides, allowing you to save money for the next trip.

Why use SafeTrip?

 CONVENIENCE
 helps you to pay the fare without interacting with the other passenger.

 PAYMENT
 you don't need to take out your coin or bank note.

 REWARDS
 we offer points for every ride to redeem free rides.

 EASY TO USE
 app tracking, points, driver's info and updates can be viewed instantly.

How to get started:

 Sign up using your mobile phone number.

 Enter the pin code that will be sent to your number.

 Enter your basic information

 Confirm your pin code and you're done!
1. How to use the app?
You need to install the application first to your mobile device then sign in or log in if you have already created your account.
2. How do I cash-in in the application?
You can cash in via GCash to load up your wallet.
3. How do I pay using the QR code scan?
The generated QR code will be displayed on the jeepney, then passengers can simply pay using the QR code scanner.
4. How to pay in the app?
You need to transfer funds or cash-in the money first in the application before you can pay the fare.
5. How to use points?
You can use it by clicking the redeem button, but at this case you need to acquire 100 pts. first.
6. How to earn points?
You can acquire 3 points each ride and you need to accumulate (100) one hundred points to get a free ride.
7. How should I contact the driver if my belongings were left behind?
You can see the driver\'s contact when you scan the QR code.
7. How to pay with multiple passenger?
Input the number of passengers in the payment section and scan the QR code attached to the jeep.
7. How to sign-in to the application?

Enter your mobile number then, you will receive an OTP to the number you have entered in the application. Then, enter the OTP then click ok. After the OTP, set your desired pin code. Then finally enter your complete name.
